meanings.definition: A woman who is the head of a household or establishment.
meanings.sent1: The padrona of the house welcomed guests with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The padrona of the household managed the daily affairs efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The padrona of the household tried to teach her cat to do chores, but it just napped all day.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was commanding, like that of a padrona overseeing her domain.
meanings.sent5: The padrona's authority was evident in every corner of the house.

meanings.sent1: As the padrona of the company, she made fair decisions for all employees.
meanings.sent2: The padrona was respected by her employees for her leadership skills.
meanings.sent3: The padrona of the office surprised everyone with a spontaneous pizza party.
meanings.sent4: She ruled the office with a firm hand, like a padrona guiding her team.
meanings.sent5: The padrona's office was always bustling with productivity.

meanings.definition: A mistress or female owner of a business.
meanings.sent1: The padrona of the restaurant greeted customers with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: She was the padrona of the boutique, ensuring everything was perfect for customers.
meanings.sent3: The padrona of the bakery loved to surprise her customers with new pastries.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the business made her a true padrona of the industry.
meanings.sent5: The padrona's business flourished under her careful management.
